36#include <config.h>
37
38#include <krb5/roken.h>
39
40/*
41 * Try to find a fqdn (with `.') in he if possible, else return h_name
42 */
43
44ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION const char * ROKEN_LIB_CALL
45hostent_find_fqdn (const struct hostent *he)
46{
47 const char *ret = he->h_name;
48 const char **h;
49
50 if (strchr (ret, '.') == NULL)
51 for (h = (const char **)he->h_aliases; *h != NULL; ++h) {
52 if (strchr (*h, '.') != NULL) {
53 ret = *h;
54 break;
55 }
56 }
57 return ret;
58}
59
